ai_description: A set of two chrome-plated steel dumbbells featuring polished silver metal weights with grooved detailing and 'KAKSS 2.5 KG' stamped on the ends. Each dumbbell has a black textured rubber grip handle designed for secure holding. The weights have a perfect round shape and are shown in both studio settings against white backgrounds and lifestyle gym environments. The chrome plating gives a premium appearance while the construction emphasizes durability and safety.
